title: Expert Study Methods
effect: Increases Knowledge gained when studying at your desk or in the library.

title: Beginner Fishing
effect: Increases the number of times you can fish before getting tired.

title: Office Work Manual
effect: Increases Diligence gained from the envelope making part-time job.

title: The Gentle Way
requirement:
Complete Quest 18.
The Avid Reader, standing outside Yomenaido Bookstore, wants you to bring him a Peach Seed. Peach Seeds can be found in non-golden dungeon chests.

title: Witch Detective
requirement:
Strength Date.
You must clear the Steamy Bathhouse before 5/29. You will recieve a call from the Strength Social Link, agree to meet up and accept the book.
NOTE: If you joined the basketball team, you mustn't be rank 4 or above. (Soccer doesn't have the requirement) Neither will call if the social link is maxed.

title: English Made Easy
effect: Increases Expression gained from the translation part-time job.

title: Easy Origami
effect: Increased Understanding gained from the origami folding part-time job.

title: The Punk's Way
requirement:
Complete Quest 20.
You must complete Quest 18 first.
The avid reader, standing outside Yomenaido Bookstore, wants you to feed a cat. Go to the Samegawa Riverbank, go to the far left and feed the cat any kind of fish. Fish can be obtained through the fishing minigame or bought from the TV shopping show.

title: 100 Ghost Stories
effect: Increases Courage gained from the hospital janitor part-time job.

title: Catching Bugs
effect: Increases the number of bugs you can catch at one time.

title: Expert Fishing
effect: Makes fishing easier by adding a quick-reel option. (Press ? when prompted)

title: Guide to Pests
requirement:
Complete Quest 34.
You must complete Quest 20 first.
The avid reader, standing outside Yomenaido Bookstore, wants you to bring him a pair of Hard Boots. Hard Boots can be bought from Daidara Metalworks once you've sold them 5 Thick Hide. Thick Hide is dropped from the Dancing Hand enemy, these are common on floors 5-8 in the Steamy Bathhouse.

title: Home Gardening
effect: Reduces the number of days required to harvest vegetables by 1.

title: Poly-land
requirement:
Strength Date.
You must go to your room on the evening of of 7/15 before leaving the house to do a time-passing activity. You will recieve a call inviting you to hang out on 7/17. (The call doesn't pass time)
NOTE: If you joined the basketball team, you mustn't be rank 5 or 6. (Soccer doesn't have the requirement) Neither will call if the social link is maxed.

title: Hyperspeed Reading
effect: Allows you to read 2 chapters of a book per sitting.

title: The O-Cha Way
requirement:
Strength Date.
You will recieve a call from the Strength Social Link, agree to meet up and accept the book.
NOTE: If you joined the basketball team, you mustn't be rank 5 or 6. (Soccer doesn't have the requirement) Neither will call if the social link is maxed.

title: Picross Rules!
requirement:
Complete Quest 40.
You must complete Quest 34 first.
The avid reader, standing outside Yomenaido Bookstore, wants you to bring him 3 Fashionable Dishes. Fashionable Dishes are dropped from the Sky Balance enemy, these are common on floors 9-10 in the Marukyu Striptease.

title: The Divine Way
requirement:
Go to the Summer Festive with a girl.
If you are in a lovers relationship with a girl, she will call you inviting you to the festival. Rise will call at any rank, Ai & Ayane will call at rink 3 or above, and Yumi will call at rank 1 or 2.

title: Food Fight!
effect: Increases all stat gains when eating at Chinese Diner Aiya

title: Who Am I?
requirement:
Complete Quest 45.
You must complete Quest 40 first.
The avid reader, standing outside Yomenaido Bookstore, will question you 4 questions about the books he previously gave you. The answers are: "Judo medalists' names.", "How one should live as a punk.", "2 pages per pest", and "Me."

title: World-Class Bugs
effect: Increases the number of bugs you can catch at one time even more.

title: The Ramen Way
requirement: Eat at Chinese Diner Aiya 8 times. (Doesn't need to be rainy day special, can be day or night)
